attributes.title: Hardcore Mini Golf Premieres June 10 - Official Trailer
attributes.caption: Watch the season premiere June 10 on FIRST.
attributes.description:
How hardcore can mini golf get? With more punishments, twists, and surprises than any amateur (or professional) golf game combined, the stakes are high and the competition is fierce on the road to hardcore victory.
Watch the season premiere June 10 on FIRST.
attributes.display_title: Hardcore Mini Golf Premieres June 10 - Official Trailer

attributes.title: Don't Talk To Me About Friendship
attributes.caption: We've got friends, enemies, and way too many costumes in the very first episode of Hardcore Mini Golf.
attributes.description: We've got friends, enemies, and way too many costumes in the very first episode of Hardcore Mini Golf.
attributes.display_title: Don't Talk To Me About Friendship

attributes.title: The Dumber the Better
attributes.caption: In the second episode of Hardcore Mini Golf, Trevor and Barbara are all for the team, Gavin and Fiona become the tee, Jeremy and Ryan fly a freak flag, and Eric and Michael explode.
attributes.description: In the second episode of Hardcore Mini Golf, Trevor and Barbara are all for the team, Gavin and Fiona become the tee, Jeremy and Ryan fly a freak flag, and Eric and Michael explode.

attributes.title: How to Pin Friends and Influence Referees
attributes.caption: In the third episode of Hardcore Mini Golf, Macho Blaine and ChrisBot grapple with poor play, Matt and Chad strike a deal, and Jeremy and Ryan bip their way to the finish line.
attributes.description: In the third episode of Hardcore Mini Golf, Macho Blaine and ChrisBot grapple with poor play, Matt and Chad strike a deal, and Jeremy and Ryan bip their way to the finish line.
attributes.display_title: How to Pin Friends and Influence Referees

attributes.title: Always Be a Gentleman
attributes.caption: In the fourth episode of Hardcore Mini Golf we're advancing to the 2nd Round! While Chilled Chaos and Trevor's rivalry escalates,  Lindsay and Macho Blaine play the kind of golf you could only dream about.
attributes.description: In the fourth episode of Hardcore Mini Golf we're advancing to the 2nd Round! While Chilled Chaos and Trevor's rivalry escalates,  Lindsay and Macho Blaine play the kind of golf you could only dream about.

attributes.title: All is Fair in Love and Golf
attributes.caption: In episode five of Hardcore Mini Golf, round two continues! Macho Blaine and Lindsay go beyond the 18th hole, Matt and Jeremy feast on the course, and Gavin and Michael have an explosive round of mini golf fitting of the name Team Nice Dynamite.
attributes.description: In episode five of Hardcore Mini Golf, round two continues! Macho Blaine and Lindsay go beyond the 18th hole, Matt and Jeremy feast on the course, and Gavin and Michael have an explosive round of mini golf fitting of the name Team Nice Dynamite.
attributes.display_title: All is Fair in Love and Golf

attributes.title: The Devil You Know
attributes.caption: Michael and Gavin compete in sudden death overtime to face off against Trevor in the semifinals, while Jeremy and Macho Blaine discuss high protein diets. Who will win, and who will eat?
attributes.description: Michael and Gavin compete in sudden death overtime to face off against Trevor in the semifinals, while Jeremy and Macho Blaine discuss high protein diets. Who will win, and who will eat?

attributes.title: Grace Under Pressure
attributes.caption: In this episode, we conclude round 3! Gavin and Trevor toot their horns, while Blaine and Jeremy get aggressive to determine the 3rd place finisher.
attributes.description: In this episode, we conclude round 3! Gavin and Trevor toot their horns, while Blaine and Jeremy get aggressive to determine the 3rd place finisher.

attributes.title: When the Going Gets Turf
attributes.caption: It. All. Comes. Down. To. This. We've arrived at the final round of the most costumed mini-golf tournament ever. Gavin and Macho Blaine square off to see who will reign supreme as Hardcore Mini-Golf Champion.
attributes.description: It. All. Comes. Down. To. This. We've arrived at the final round of the most costumed mini-golf tournament ever. Gavin and Macho Blaine square off to see who will reign supreme as Hardcore Mini-Golf Champion.
